member.name: M:OSIsoft.AF.UI.AFOperations.Connect(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,OSIsoft.AF.PISystem,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Connects to the PISystem.

The PISystem.
If true, a test is made for missing PI systems after the connect, otherwise no test is made.

member.name: M:OSIsoft.AF.UI.AFTreeView.AFSelect(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Selects the object in the tree.
member.param: The object to select.

The context of the selection. When an item can appear in multiple places in the tree, the context aids in selecting the correct location. When a context is provided, the selection mechanism will prefer finding the specified afobject under tree node represented by the context.
A filter which limits where the object may be found at. For example, a category when selecting elements.
A path to the object can server as a backup mechanism for finding the specified object, or, can be used when the object could appear in multiple places in the tree.

member.name: M:OSIsoft.AF.UI.AFTreeView.AFSelect(System.Object,System.Object,System.String)

A path to the object can server as a backup mechanism for finding the specified object, or, can be used when the object could appear in multiple places in the tree.
